announce(bytes,bytes).details: Announces msg.sender's publicKey and multiaddress. Multiaddress confirmation should be done off-chain, peer id in the multiaddr is discarded in favour of the pubkey derived one.

bumpChannel(address,bytes32).details: Request a channelEpoch bump, so we can make a new set of commitments Implies that msg.sender is the destination of the channel.

params.newCommitment: , a secret derived from this new commitment
params.source: the address of the channel source

params._secsClosure: seconds until a channel can be closed

finalizeChannelClosure(address).details: Finalize the channel closure, if cool-off period is over it will close the channel and transfer funds to the sender. Then emits {ChannelUpdated} and the {ChannelClosureFinalized} event.

fundChannelMulti(address,address,uint256.details: Funds channels, in both directions, between 2 parties. then emits {ChannelUpdated} event, for each channel.

initiateChannelClosure(address).details: Initialize channel closure. When a channel owner (the 'source' of the channel) wants to 'cash out', they must notify the counterparty (the 'destination') that they will do so, and provide enough time for them to redeem any outstanding tickets before-hand. This notice period is called the 'cool-off' period. The channel 'destination' should be monitoring blockchain events, thus they should be aware that the closure has been triggered, as this method triggers a {ChannelUpdated} and an {ChannelClosureInitiated} event. After the cool-off period expires, the 'source' can call 'finalizeChannelClosure' which withdraws the stake.

multicall(bytes[]).details: Receives and executes a batch of function calls on this contract.

redeemTicket(address,bytes32,uint256,uin.details: redeem a ticket. If the sender has a channel to the source, the amount will be transferred to that channel, otherwise it will be sent to their address directly.

params.nextCommitment: the commitment that hashes to the redeemers previous commitment
params.winProb: the winning probability of the ticket

params.amount: uint256 amount of tokens to transfer
params.operatorData: bytes extra information provided by the operator (if any)
params.userData: bytes extra information provided by the token holder (if any)

channels.details: Stored channels keyed by their channel ids

publicKeys.details: Stored publicKeys keyed by their address

secsClosure.details: Seconds it takes until we can finalize channel closure once, channel closure has been initialized.

token.details: HoprToken, the token that will be used to settle payments

ChannelClosureFinalized(address,address,.notice: Emitted once a channel closure is finalized.

ChannelClosureInitiated(address,address,.notice: Emitted once a channel closure is initialized.

ChannelFunded(address,address,address,ui.notice: Emitted once a channel if funded.

ChannelOpened(address,address).notice: Emitted once a channel is opened.

ChannelUpdated(address,address,(uint256,.notice: Emitted on every channel state change.

TicketRedeemed(address,address,bytes32,u.notice: Emitted once a ticket is redeemed.

tokensReceived(address,address,address,u.notice: A hook triggered when HOPR tokens are sent to this contract.
